theDuelist:BasicArchetype.NAME: 决斗卡
theDuelist:BasicArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add every Duelist card to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Duelist
Every single card available in the mod, including random-generation only cards.

theDuelist:DragonsArchetype.NAME: 龙
theDuelist:DragonsArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Dragon cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dragons
All Dragon monsters, Mountain, Flute of Summoning Dragon, Lord of D., Buster Blader, and Dragon Capture Jar. No Toons, no God cards.

theDuelist:MagnetArchetype.NAME: 磁铁
theDuelist:MagnetArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Magnet Warrior cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Magnet Warriors
Alpha Magnet Warrior, Beta Magnet Warrior, Gamma Magnet Warrior, and Valkyrion.

theDuelist:NatureArchetype.NAME: 性质
theDuelist:NatureArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Insect, Plant and Predaplant cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Nature
All Insect, Plant and Predaplant monsters; Cocoon of Evolution, Super Solar Nutrient, Predaponics, Predapruning, and Violet Crystal.

theDuelist:SpellcasterArchetype.NAME: 施法者
theDuelist:SpellcasterArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Spellcaster cards to your card pool.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Spellcasters
All Spellcaster monsters, Yami, and Book of Secret Arts. No Exodia cards.

theDuelist:SpellsArchetype.NAME: 法术
theDuelist:SpellsArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add Spell cards to your card pool.

All Spells, except for Toon spells and specific keyword spells (like Yami, Mountain, Violet Crystal).

5 pieces of Exoida, plus Legendary Exodia Incarnate.

theDuelist:GodArchetype.NAME: 神
theDuelist:GodArchetype.DESCRIPTION: Add all God cards to your card pool.

Slifer the Sky Dragon, Obelisk the Tormentor, Winged Dragon of Ra, and the Creator.
